alert.note: Alert for Spokane (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 8:29AM PDT until August 12 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: The National Weather Service in Spokane has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Spokane County in northeastern Washington... * Until 900 AM PDT. * At 829 AM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles southeast of Cheney, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Rockford, Spangle, Plaza, Mica and Valleyford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
